creditline: Gift of Ellen and Fred Wells
description: gofu background; head and shoulders of figure with wrinkled face and long thin fingers; gold and pink garment; gold ground
markings: 九十之内 {kyūjū no nai} [Seal no. 31], 光溪之印 {Kōkei no in} [Seal no. 17]
medium: Woodblock print; ink and color on paper
portfolio: From Bust Portraits Series VII 第七期大首絵シリーズ
text: 111th design by Kōkei. Actor Nakamura Utaemon VI (1917-2001) as the prostitute Chitose-dayū 千歳太夫 in the play "Sanbasō from the Licensed Quarter" (Kuruwa Sanbasō 廓三番叟), performed at the Kabuki Theater in January of 1989.
title: Actor Nakamura Utaemon VI as the Prostitute Chitose-dayū
